desc: Discover the latest collection of Ingersoll designer mens and ladies watches. Shop Ingersoll 1892 designer watches for men and women at our online watch shop.

layout.text:
Remaining true to the watchmaking heritage of Ingersoll. A timeless and elegant
design with perfectly balanced styling that fuses vintage and contemporary.

Our skeleton collection is the heart of the brand and consist of the widest offering of styles.
Expertly crafted to showcase the complexities of our beautifully engineered automatic movements.
